quotes.quote: I miss our talks, I miss our laughs, I miss us spending time together, but in the end I only miss you.
The world is very quiet without you around.
I miss you deeply, unfathomably, senselessly, terribly.
I miss you more than the sun misses the sky at night.
I think part of me doesn't want to remember him, for fear of missing him too much.
I miss you every second of every minute, every minute of every hour, every hour of everyday.
A hug for you means I need you. A kiss for you means I love you. A call for you means I'm missing you.
She wanted to tell him she missed him but she knew it wouldn't change anything so she kept pretending she didn't.
When I close my eyes I see you, when I open my eyes I miss you.
If I had a single flower for every time I think about you, I could walk forever in my garden.
I have a late conversation with the moon, he tells me about the sun, and I tell him about you.
I miss him in so many ways, but right now I miss him in the way you always miss someone when you're single among a room full of couples.
It's true we don't know what we've got until its gone, but we don't know what we've been missing until it arrives.
When I miss you, I read our old conversations, smile like an idiot, listen to songs that remind me of you, then miss you more.
Thou art gone from my gaze like a beautiful dream. And I seek thee in vain by the meadow and stream.
If I knew I would miss you so badly, I wouldn't have loved you.
Not a day goes by that I don't look at your picture and smile. Or cry. Or both.
I miss you like an idiot misses the point.
Have you ever missed someone so much that even the thought of them made you burst into tears?
When I miss you, I don't have to go farâ€¦I just have to look inside my heart because that's where I'll find you.
She misses him more now than when he was away.
How could I miss you while you are never off of my mind.....while you are never missing from my heart.
I keep myself busy with the things I do. But every time I pause, I still think of you.
I miss him so badly it hurts.
